member.remarks: The API key passed was not valid or has expired.

member.remarks: The passed signature was invalid.

member.name: T:FlickrNet.Exceptions.MethodNotFoundException
member.summary: The method name supplied was not recognised by Flickr.
member.remarks: While using the FlickrNet library you should not encounter this error, unless Flickr removes a particular method from the API.

member.name: T:FlickrNet.Exceptions.MissingSignatureException
member.summary: Error 97: Missing signature exception.
member.remarks: The call required signing but no signature was sent.

member.name: T:FlickrNet.Exceptions.PermissionDeniedException
member.summary: Error: Permission Denied.
member.remarks: The owner of the photo does not want to share the data wih you.

member.name: T:FlickrNet.Exceptions.PhotoNotFoundException
member.summary: No photo with the photo ID supplied to the method could be found.
member.remarks: This could mean the photo does not exist, or that you do not have permission to view the photo.

member.name: T:FlickrNet.Exceptions.PhotosetNotFoundException
member.summary: No photoset with the photoset ID supplied to the method could be found.
member.remarks: This could mean the photoset does not exist, or that you do not have permission to view the photoset.

member.name: T:FlickrNet.Exceptions.ServiceUnavailableException
member.summary: Error: 105: Service currently unavailable
member.remarks: The requested service is temporarily unavailable.

member.name: T:FlickrNet.Exceptions.UserNotFoundException
member.summary: No user with the user ID supplied to the method could be found.
member.remarks: This could mean the user does not exist, or that you do not have permission to view the user.

member.name: T:FlickrNet.Exceptions.UserNotLoggedInInsufficientPermissionsException
member.summary: Error: 99: User not logged in / Insufficient permissions
member.remarks: The method requires user authentication but the user was not logged in, or the authenticated method call did not have the required permissions.

member.name: M:FlickrNet.Flickr.PhotosGeoBatchCorrectLocationAsync(System.Double,System.Double,FlickrNet.GeoAccuracy,System.String,System.String,System.Action{FlickrNet.FlickrResult{FlickrNet.NoResponse}})
member.summary: Correct the places hierarchy for all the photos for a user at a given latitude, longitude and accuracy.
member.remarks: Batch corrections are processed in a delayed queue so it may take a few minutes before the changes are reflected in a user's photos.
member.param: The latitude of the photos to be update whose valid range is -90 to 90. Anything more than 6 decimal places will be truncated.
The longitude of the photos to be updated whose valid range is -180 to 180. Anything more than 6 decimal places will be truncated.
Recorded accuracy level of the photos to be updated. World level is 1, Country is ~3, Region ~6, City ~11, Street ~16. Current range is 1-16. Defaults to 16 if not specified.
A Flickr Places ID. (While optional, you must pass either a valid Places ID or a WOE ID.)
A Where On Earth (WOE) ID. (While optional, you must pass either a valid Places ID or a WOE ID.)
Callback method to call upon return of the response from Flickr.

member.param: The ID of the photo whose WOE location is being corrected.
A Flickr Places ID. (While optional, you must pass either a valid Places ID or a WOE ID.)
A Where On Earth (WOE) ID. (While optional, you must pass either a valid Places ID or a WOE ID.)
Callback method to call upon return of the response from Flickr.

member.name: M:FlickrNet.Flickr.PhotosGeoSetContextAsync(System.String,FlickrNet.GeoContext,System.Action{FlickrNet.FlickrResult{FlickrNet.NoResponse}})
member.summary: Indicate the state of a photo's geotagginess beyond latitude and longitude.
member.remarks: Note : photos passed to this method must already be geotagged (using the flickr.photos.geo.setLocation method).
member.param: The id of the photo to set context data for.
Context is a numeric value representing the photo's geotagginess beyond latitude and longitude. For example, you may wish to indicate that a photo was taken "indoors" or "outdoors".
Callback method to call upon return of the response from Flickr.

For example if you only have 3 photos taken in the locality of Montreal (WOE ID 3534) but your threshold is set to 5 then those photos will be "rolled up" and included instead with a place record for the region of Quebec (WOE ID 2344924).

The raduis units to subscribe to. Only applies if topic is 'geo'.
The accuracy of the geo search to subscribe to. Only applies if topic is 'geo'.
A list of Commons Institutes to subscribe to. Only applies if topic is 'commons'. If not present this argument defaults to all Flickr Commons institutions.
A list of strings to be used for tag subscriptions. Photos with one or more of the tags listed will be included in the subscription. Only valid if the topic is 'tags'

member.name: M:FlickrNet.Flickr.PhotosGeoBatchCorrectLocation(System.Double,System.Double,FlickrNet.GeoAccuracy,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Correct the places hierarchy for all the photos for a user at a given latitude, longitude and accuracy.
member.remarks: Batch corrections are processed in a delayed queue so it may take a few minutes before the changes are reflected in a user's photos.
member.param: The latitude of the photos to be update whose valid range is -90 to 90. Anything more than 6 decimal places will be truncated.
The longitude of the photos to be updated whose valid range is -180 to 180. Anything more than 6 decimal places will be truncated.
Recorded accuracy level of the photos to be updated. World level is 1, Country is ~3, Region ~6, City ~11, Street ~16. Current range is 1-16. Defaults to 16 if not specified.
A Flickr Places ID. (While optional, you must pass either a valid Places ID or a WOE ID.)
A Where On Earth (WOE) ID. (While optional, you must pass either a valid Places ID or a WOE ID.)

member.summary: Correct the places hierarchy for a given photo.
member.param: The ID of the photo whose WOE location is being corrected.
A Flickr Places ID. (While optional, you must pass either a valid Places ID or a WOE ID.)
A Where On Earth (WOE) ID. (While optional, you must pass either a valid Places ID or a WOE ID.)

member.name: P:FlickrNet.Flickr.ApiSecret
member.summary: API shared secret is required for all calls that require signing, which includes all methods that require authentication, as well as the actual flickr.auth.* calls.

member.name: P:FlickrNet.Flickr.AuthToken
member.summary: The authentication token is required for all calls that require authentication. A will be raised by Flickr if the authentication token is not set when required.
member.remarks: It should be noted that some methods will work without the authentication token, but will return different results if used with them (such as group pool requests, and results which include private pictures the authenticated user is allowed to see (their own, or others).

member.name: T:FlickrNet.FlickrConfigurationSettings
member.summary: Configuration settings for the Flickr.Net API Library.

remarks.p: First, register the configuration section in the configSections section:
Next, include the following config section:

p.code: <flickrNet apiKey="1234567890abc" // optional secret="2134123" // optional token="234234" // optional cacheSize="1234" // optional, in bytes (defaults to 50 * 1024 * 1024 = 50MB) cacheTimeout="[d.]HH:mm:ss" // optional, defaults to 1 day (1.00:00:00) - day component is optional // e.g. 10 minutes = 00:10:00 or 1 hour = 01:00:00 or 2 days, 12 hours = 2.12:00:00 > <proxy // proxy element is optional, but if included the attributes below are mandatory as mentioned ipaddress="127.0.0.1" // mandatory port="8000" // mandatory username="username" // optional, but must have password if included password="password" // optional, see username domain="domain" // optional, used for Microsoft authenticated proxy servers /> </flickrNet>

member.name: M:FlickrNet.FlickrConfigurationSettings.#ctor(System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Loads FlickrConfigurationSettings with the settings in the config file.
member.param: XmlNode containing the configuration settings.

member.summary: Cache size in bytes. 0 if not present. Optional.

member.summary: Cache timeout. Equals TimeSpan.MinValue is not present. Optional.

member.name: T:FlickrNet.PersistentCache
member.summary:
A threadsafe cache that is backed by disk storage.
All public methods that read or write state must be protected by the lockFile. Private methods should not acquire the lockFile as it is not reentrant.

member.name: M:FlickrNet.PersistentCache.#ctor(System.String,FlickrNet.CacheItemPersister)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the for the given filename and cache type.

member.name: M:FlickrNet.PersistentCache.ToArray(System.Type)
member.summary: Return all items in the cache. Works similarly to ArrayList.ToArray(Type).

member.name: M:FlickrNet.PersistentCache.Get(System.String,System.TimeSpan,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the specified key from the cache unless it has expired.
member.param: The key to look up in the cache.
The maximum age the item can be before it is no longer returned.
Whether to delete the item if it has expired or not.

member.name: M:FlickrNet.PersistentCache.Flush
member.summary: Clears the current cache of items.

member.name: M:FlickrNet.PersistentCache.Shrink(System.Int64)
member.summary: Shrinks the current cache to a specific size, removing older items first.

member.name: M:FlickrNet.PersistentCache.InternalSet(System.String,FlickrNet.ICacheItem)
member.returns: The old value associated with key, if any.

member.summary: Gets or sets cache values.
